data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen @stefanbar Gill, when I actually look at the data visualizer I see there is a message: "This Token is no longer valid"

I assume our credentials are not working anymore. Please can you get Shaun to follow up with LS on this one?

We have a user id on our side: a126c8ed-b598-4acc-9c60-2969da439be8

PLease just send that to them and ask to send us a new one?
